page.title: 06A miner's leisure time.
page.content:
After finishing work I have a shower and go to the canteen for a cup of tea before catching the bus for home, the bus arrives at Tumble at 3 p.m..
On reaching home I have another cup of tea whilst waiting for my meal to be ready, after eating I go and lie down for half an hour. On getting up I go out and cut coal ready for my own fire in the house, I riddle the ashes and generally tidy up around the back.
I like to watch the evening news and after it has finished at 6.30 p.m. I take my two Staffordshire Bull Terriers for a walk. Since they like a lot of exercise the walk usually lasts about 2 hours. When I reach home I have supper and then I watch television until I go to bed about 11 p.m..
